content.question: Which of the following statements about the titration is true at the equivalence point?

choices.label: <math alttext="the molar concentration of C 9 H 8 O 4" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></math> is greater than <math alttext="the molar concentration of C 9 H 7 O 4 with a negative 1 charge" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></math>.

<math alttext="the molar concentration of C 9 H 8 O 4" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></math> is less than <math alttext="the molar concentration of C 9 H 7 O 4 with a negative 1 charge" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></math>.

<math alttext="the molar concentration of C 9 H 8 O 4" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></math> is equal to <math alttext="the molar concentration of C 9 H 7 O 4 with a negative 1 charge" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></math>.

The relationship between <math alttext="the molar concentration of C 9 H 8 O 4" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></math> and <math alttext="the molar concentration of C 9 H 7 O 4 with a negative 1 charge" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>[</mtext><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mtext>]</mtext></mrow></math> cannot be determined without additional information.

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
